name: Moskilltoes
description:
Welcome to Moskilltoes!

Evil mosquitoes invaded a little boy's room and are trying to get to him so they can get all of his blood, and YOU ARE THE ONLY ONE THAT CAN STOP THEM!!!

Choose the mosquitoes letters on the game keyboard in order to kill them, each turn you can choose three letters, and the remaining mosquitoes fly one step closer to the boy. A random number of mosquitoes is spawned at the beggining of each turn.

Have fun and protect the boy for as long as you can by combining letters to multikill mosquitoes and strategizing which mosquito has to fall first, since they all have different speeds and can be killed in different ways.

Maybe his parents should've put a mosquito screen in his room...
